name: SubSilence Commands
desc: These commands are personal for the SubSilence Discord server.

commands.name: .party create [name] [max-size]
commands.desc: This will create a new party with the given name and size.

commands.name: .party config [name] [option] [value]
commands.desc: With this command, you can change several party values such as 'Game', 'MaxPlayers', 'Description', 'Image' and 'Joinable'

commands.name: .party disband [name]
commands.desc: This will delete the party. This command can only be executed by the owner of the party.

commands.name: .party list [name]
commands.desc: This will show all information about the given party.

commands.name: .party join [name]
commands.desc: This command makes you join the given party.

commands.name: .party leave [name]
commands.desc: This command makes you leave the given party.
